ResourceHeader.Description: This data product contains 0.03125-s (32 Hz) burst-mode values of solar wind magnetic field data taken by the IMPACT/Magnetometer on STEREO-B. The interface allows selection of STEREO A or STEREO B data and of vector quantities in RTN or spacecraft coordinates. It also allows selection of either of two parameter sets: [Bx, By, Bz, |B|] or [RBx, RBy, RBz, |B|, cone and clock angles]. Further, the interface enables easy migration between plot vs. ASCII data presentation options and among the three available resolutions (1, 8, 32 Hz).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT PI, Dr. Janet Luhmann (UCB), and the Key Persons for the IMPACT Magnetometer (C. Smith, Bartol) and the late M. Acuna (GSFC).
